duration.description: Transition duration in ms, 250 by default
duration.description_zh: 过渡持续时间（以毫秒为单位），默认为 250

enterDelay.description: Delay in ms before enter transition starts
enterDelay.description_zh: 进入转换开始前的延迟（毫秒）

exitDelay.description: Delay in ms before exit transition starts
exitDelay.description_zh: 退出转换开始前的延迟（毫秒）

exitDuration.description: Exit transition duration in ms, 250 by default
exitDuration.description_zh: 退出过渡持续时间（以毫秒为单位），默认为 250

keepMounted.description: If set element will not be unmounted from the DOM when it is hidden, display: none styles will be applied instead
keepMounted.description_zh: 如果 set 元素在隐藏时不会从 DOM 中卸载，则将应用 display： none 样式

onEnter.description_zh: 在进入过渡开始时调用

onEntered.description_zh: 在进入过渡结束时调用

onExit.description_zh: 在退出过渡开始时调用

timingFunction.description: Transition timing function, theme.transitionTimingFunction by default
timingFunction.description_zh: 过渡定时函数，默认为 theme.transitionTimingFunction

children.description: Render function with transition styles argument
children.description_zh: 带有过渡样式参数的 render 函数

mounted.description: Determines whether component should be mounted to the DOM
mounted.description_zh: 确定是否应将组件挂载到 DOM
